protein.specific_function: The enzyme apparently serves as a quinone reductase in connection with conjugation reactions of hydroquinons involved in detoxification pathways as well as in biosynthetic processes such as the vitamin K-dependent gamma-carboxylation of glutamate residues in prothrombin synthesis.

go_class.description: positive regulation of neuron apoptotic process
regulation of cellular amino acid metabolic process
